column1: #Text=Main Asami Bolin Bumi Jinora Kai Korra Kya Mako Tenzin Antagonists Ghazan Ming - Hua P'Li Zaheer says : " Minor Chow Daw Druk Ikki Iroh Lin Beifong Meelo Naga Opal Beifong Pabu Pema Rohan Suyin Beifong Tonraq Tu Yin Zuko " Shiro Shinobi says : " Bolin , Opal , and Lin rescued the Beifongs and Zhu Li from Kuvira .
